#include <stdio.h>

int main() {
	
	int t, a, b, c, minVal, maxVal, v;

	scanf("%d", &t );

	while( t-- ) {

		scanf("%d %d %d", &a, &b, &c );
		maxVal = ( ( ( a > b ) && ( a > c ) ) ? a : ( ( b > c ) ? b : c ) );
		minVal = ( ( ( a < b ) && ( a < c ) ) ? a : ( ( b < c ) ? b : c ) );
		v = a + b + c - maxVal - minVal;
		printf("%d\n", v );
	}
	return 0;
}
